title: How to change server  from Oce to NA
body: I want to transfer my account since I'm moving to america, but they don't sell transfer ticket at the store. I remember I have seen them selling it before, howcome they removed it? is it still available to transfer from OCE to NA?

replies.body:
Hi,

It is normally possible to transfer using the store, however they are currently disabled while we hand out End of Season Rewards.  Check back in a few days and it should be all enabled again.

You can also check the [service status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce) for the latest info!

Cheers
Mindstar
please man when can i transfer again?
i got that one too, i wanna to transfer my account to eu but the transfer ticket is disabled now
